attributes.title: I got hacked
attributes.review: This app killed my battery and screwed up my privacy settings. I’m convinced that since I downloaded it, it has been watching me. That would explain the battery drainage and the sudden flood of targeted ads about very specific things I mentioned in conversation. I don’t trust it, but I trust my president. Must be the Russians.

attributes.title: rip tommy
attributes.review: when i first for the app, i thought it was my part in making america great again! but lying is a sin and i would NEVER! sin. my mommy taught me well and i’m here today to say that this app is horrid. it killed my fish tommy and i had to get a new phone. also thanks to this app i lost my moms number, so mom if you see this i miss you 🥺

attributes.title: Trump you need to fix this app😡🤬🤢🤮
attributes.review: This app has the audacity to delete  my account and my AMAZING😒 president it should be taken off the App Store so other republicans don’t have to go through what I did truly a nightmare and it also sent my address to other people on this app I will not allow this to happen

attributes.title: Privacy Policy
attributes.review: This app uses your name, email, birthday information to “Where you order goods or services, performing credit checking or other authentication” as well as sell your information to third parties. Read the privacy policy!!!!! Is my information being sold to another country??? #unamerican

attributes.title: Fake news😔
attributes.review: Man I got this app for trump himself😣 but after using it, it started spreading fake news😔. I tried to see past it but it was to much to handle. I was happy to download it but it was to much to handle. I wanted to stay informed but I just can’t anymore. To my fellow trumpies don’t download it please it just doesn’t work.💗

attributes.title: too many ads
attributes.review: Thought it would be the best way to receive rally notifications but all the ads seem to be for feet pictures? A little glitchy too. Uninstalling after I started receiving spam text messages, hope it’s not malware.

attributes.title: WOULD NOT RECOMMEND
attributes.review: if you are coming into this app expecting to see some daddy trump nudes in the flesh, then you are going to be SEVERELY DISAPPOINTED!! there was NOTHING of the sort here, only pictures of him in FULL CLOTHES. i was hot and ready to see some white president schmeat yet this app did not deliver as promised and so i was left with nothing but emptiness and despair, -1/10!! WOULD NOT RECOMMEND

attributes.title: This app is cursed
attributes.review: I downloaded this app so that I could support my one true king, Donald Trump, but my life turned for the worst the moment I hit the download button. First, my car got totaled, then my my Minecraft account got deleted then my dog got cancer, and now I’m being held hostage by a war criminal. It’s safe to say I will NOT be voting for Donald Trump this year!

attributes.title: Fake news media
attributes.review: This app is made by the fake news media, it shows your children pornography when all you want is to donate to a BERY RICH MAN. We dont need his tax returns. He knows many many trustworthy people. Very fine people. Very fine indeed. This is not made by those people. This is made by the bad hombres. Do not get this app.

attributes.title: Cant do anything without giving up my phone #
attributes.review: Not a fan of an app that requires your phone number just to use or even check it out first. Deleted it right after I got it cuz I can’t do anything with it without giving out my personal information.
